feature.label: HiBurn
feature.description: HiBurn is for burning files to devices.
feature.copyright: Fastboot is for burning files to devices.
feature.license:
Change History HiBurn-v3.0.0 (2014-08-01) [New Features] 1.The module status can be monitored in each phase and related information is displayed (only for Hi3798M V100 currently). 2.The network interface selection option is added to Preference.
[Resolved Issues] 1. A display exception occurs when the HiTool runs on a small screen. 2. The length of the last partition is not automatically calculated.
